about_the_game:
The story in brief


A message from a friend who has been missing for almost a year catches your attention and upon arriving at the venue as requested you discover a beautiful modern mansion complete with a stunning outdoor garden. Upon entering the property you discover that you are now trapped and must find a way to escape.

Minor details are important


Try and escape the House by paying close attention to various audio cues and visual details that might give you a hint at the house's weaknesses, while also discovering clues relating to previous unfortunates who fell victim to the house and were unable to escape.

Be vary when interacting with the various objects scattered throughout the house since some objects tend to create various incidents that may hinder your ability to escape.

The story in brief


A message from a friend who has been missing for almost a year catches your attention and upon arriving at the venue as requested you discover a beautiful modern mansion complete with a stunning outdoor garden. Upon entering the property you discover that you are now trapped and must find a way to escape.

Minor details are important


Try and escape the House by paying close attention to various audio cues and visual details that might give you a hint at the house's weaknesses, while also discovering clues relating to previous unfortunates who fell victim to the house and were unable to escape.

Be vary when interacting with the various objects scattered throughout the house since some objects tend to create various incidents that may hinder your ability to escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: intel i3 6th gen or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660Ti or equivalent GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: intel i5 6th gen or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or equivalent GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor, RTX card is not mandatory but is required to play this game with Ray Tracing

short_description: Explore the house and surrounding garden to uncover clues and to find a way out.
